remarks: A degenerate form of antecedent swapping.  The number '1' in the theorem name indicates that it handles a chain of length 1. Since there is just one antecedent in the chain, there is nothing to swap.  Non-degenerated forms begin with ~ wl-impchain-com-1.2 , for more see there.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 7-Jul-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-impchain-com-1.1.1 $e |- ( ps -> ph ) $.
wl-impchain-com-1.1 $p |- ( ps -> ph ) $.
